attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Drug related crime is a huge worry to all of us, the government tries to sate our worries by introducing tougher sentences on suppliers and heavy users, this however does little to really hit the root of the problem.
Many normally law abiding citizens find themselves being forced in to a criminal underworld for a habit that spins rapidly out of control. Drugs are readily available to those that want them, this is a fact that cannot be ignored, by legalising them and ending the stigma attached to their use people with problems will be more readily willing to actively seek help, rather than turn to crime to support their habit that they are told society will shun them for.
